definition: to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

sentences.english: Wuxi Deputy harmony is your loyalty to the partnership.
sentences.chinese: 无锡和谐帮办是你忠诚的伙伴。

sentences.english: Wuxi Deputy harmony to your agent in Wuxi district affairs.
sentences.chinese: 无锡和谐帮办为你代理在无锡地区事务。

definition: to act for sb else/to act on sb's behalf/an agent/a diplomatic representative/a chargé d'affaires
the Qing dynasty equivalent of the Foreign Office
money donation to relieve distress or famine
Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Qing Dynasty
to assist in managing (e.g. traffic police or crowd control)/to steward
to supervise (troops)/to appoint (officers)/to select and assign
